meta.name: Monitor cryptocurrency payments across multiple blockchains with AgentGatePay

nodes.name: ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Manual Trigger
nodes.notes:
‚ñ∂Ô∏è MANUAL TRIGGER: Click 'Execute Workflow' to run

‚ö†Ô∏è Configure your API key in Node 2 before running!

This workflow runs standalone without webhooks.
All data is fetched from AgentGatePay API.

nodes.notes:
‚öôÔ∏è SETUP: Validate inputs

‚ö†Ô∏è EDIT THIS if running manually:
- user_email: Your buyer email
- api_key: Your AgentGatePay API key

nodes.name: 3Ô∏è‚É£ üìà Get User Analytics
nodes.notes:
üìà ANALYTICS: Fetch user spending stats

nodes.notes:

Shows last 10 payments with:
- tx_hash
- amount_usd
- status
- timestamp
- receiver

nodes.name: 5Ô∏è‚É£ üìã Get Audit Logs (24h)
nodes.notes:
üìã AUDIT: Fetch payment events by wallet

Filtered by:
- client_id (wallet address)
- event_type: x402_payment_settled
- Last 24 hours
- Max 50 events

Shows: blockchain payments from this wallet

parameters.url: ={{ $('2Ô∏è‚É£ Load Config').first().json.config.api_url }}/audit/logs?client_id={{ $('2Ô∏è‚É£ Load Config').first().json.config.buyer_wallet }}&event_type=x402_payment_settled&hours={{ $('2Ô∏è‚É£ Load Config').first().json.config.time_range_hours }}&limit={{ $('2Ô∏è‚É£ Load Config').first().json.config.audit_log_limit }}

nodes.name: 6Ô∏è‚É£ üîë Get Active Mandates
nodes.notes:
üîë MANDATES: Fetch all issued mandates

Shows:
- mandate_id
- budget_usd
- budget_remaining
- ttl_hours
- scope
- status

nodes.name: 7Ô∏è‚É£ üîç Prepare Verification
nodes.notes: üîç PREPARE: Check if we have tx_hash to verify

nodes.name: 7BÔ∏è‚É£ Has TX Hash?
nodes.notes: üîÄ ROUTER: Only verify if tx_hash exists

nodes.name: 8Ô∏è‚É£ ‚úÖ Verify on Blockchain
nodes.notes:
‚úÖ BLOCKCHAIN: Verify payment on-chain

Checks:
- Transaction exists
- Correct amount
- Correct recipient
- Block confirmation

nodes.name: 8BÔ∏è‚É£ Skip Verification
nodes.notes: ‚è≠Ô∏è  SKIP: No tx_hash to verify

nodes.name: 9Ô∏è‚É£ Merge Verification
nodes.notes: üîÄ MERGE: Combine verified/skipped paths

nodes.name: üîü üìä Calculate Statistics
nodes.notes:
üìä STATISTICS: Calculate trends and metrics

Calculates:
- Spending trends
- Budget utilization %
- Recent activity (24h)
- Mandate status
- Event breakdown

nodes.name: 1Ô∏è‚É£1Ô∏è‚É£ üö® Check Alerts
nodes.notes:
üö® ALERTS: Check for warnings

Checks:
- Budget < 10% remaining
- Mandate expires < 24h
- Failed payments
- High spending rate
- No activity in 24h

nodes.name: 1Ô∏è‚É£2Ô∏è‚É£ üì± Format Dashboard
nodes.notes:
üì± DASHBOARD: Format metrics for display

Creates:
- Key metrics cards
- Alert summary
- Quick stats
- Links to full dashboard
- Export options

nodes.name: 1Ô∏è‚É£3Ô∏è‚É£ üìÑ Generate CSV Export
nodes.notes:
üìÑ EXPORT: Generate CSV report

Includes:
- Summary metrics
- Alerts
- Payment history (last 10)
- Active mandates
- Event summary

Copy csv_export field to save

nodes.name: 1Ô∏è‚É£4Ô∏è‚É£ üìã Final Report
nodes.notes:
üìã FINAL REPORT: Complete formatted output

Includes:
- Key metrics summary
- Alerts and warnings
- Spending analysis
- Recent payments
- Active mandates
- Event activity
- Dashboard links (hybrid)
- Export options

‚úÖ This is the final output!

parameters.content:
# Buyer Monitoring Dashboard

**What it does:** Shows your spending, payment history, mandates, and alerts.

**Quick start:**
1. Edit Node 2: Add your wallet address, email and API key
2. Click Execute Workflow
3. Check Node 14 for the full report

**What you'll see:**
- Total spent and payment count
- Budget remaining from active mandates
- Recent payments (last 50)
- Alerts (low budget, failed payments, etc.)
- Transaction verification status

**Run it:** Manually anytime, or trigger from payment workflows for auto-monitoring

**Export:** Node 13 has CSV data you can copy and save

## Data Collection

Fetches analytics, payment history, audit logs, and active mandates from AgentGatePay API. All data filtered by your wallet address.

## Blockchain Verification

If you provide a tx_hash, verifies the payment on-chain. Otherwise skips and merges empty result. Helps confirm your latest transaction went through.

## Analysis & Alerts

Calculates spending trends, budget utilization, and checks for issues. Alerts trigger when budget drops below 10% or mandates expire soon.

## Output Generation

Formats dashboard with key metrics, generates CSV export for spreadsheets, and creates the final report. Node 14 is your main output.

nodes.notes:

Filtered by:
- event_type: x402_payment_settled
- Last 24 hours
- Max 50 events

Shows: payments received

parameters.content:
# Seller Monitoring Dashboard

**What it does:** Shows your revenue, payments received, webhooks, and alerts.

**Quick start:**
1. Edit Node 2: Add your merchant wallet, email and API key
2. Click Execute Workflow
3. Check Node 14 for the full report

**What you'll see:**
- Total revenue and payment count
- Top buyers and average payment
- Recent payments (last 50)
- Webhook delivery status
- Alerts (failed webhooks, payment issues, etc.)

**Run it:** Manually anytime, or trigger from seller workflows for auto-monitoring

**Export:** Node 13 has CSV data you can copy and save

## Revenue Collection

Fetches merchant revenue, payments received, webhook config, and audit logs from AgentGatePay API. All data filtered by your wallet address.

## Payment Verification

If you provide a tx_hash, verifies the payment you received on-chain. Otherwise skips and merges empty result. Helps confirm your latest payment arrived.

## Analysis & Alerts

Calculates revenue trends, webhook success rates, top buyers. Alerts trigger when webhooks fail or payment success rate drops below 90%.

## Output Generation

Formats dashboard with key metrics, generates CSV export for accounting, and creates the final report. Node 14 is your main output.
